code:
graph TD
    %% Subgraphs: Organized by Functional Role

    %% Thalamus
    subgraph Thalamus[Education_LMS_Portal]
        sovl_main[Education_LMS_Portal]
        sovl_conductor[Education_ContentCDN]
        sovl_events[Education_ClassroomService]
    end

    %% Cerebellum
    subgraph Cerebellum[Education_StudentDB]
        sovl_monitor[Education_LMS_Portal]
        sovl_memory[Education_ClassroomService]
        sovl_resource[Education_ContentCDN]
        sovl_cli[Education_ContentCDN]
    end

    %% Reticular Formation
    subgraph Reticular_Formation[Education_ContentCDN]
        sovl_processor[Education_StudentDB]
        sovl_utils[Education_StudentDB]
        sovl_io[Education_LMS_Portal]
    end

    %% Ganglia
    subgraph Ganglia[Education_ClassroomService]
        sovl_config[Education_GradeSync]
        sovl_schema[Education_StudentDB]
    end

    %% Cerebral Cortex 
    subgraph Cerebral_Cortex[Education_LMS_Portal]
        sovl_generation[Education_ContentCDN]
        sovl_primer[Education_ContentCDN]
    end

    %% Limbic System
    subgraph Limbic_System[Education_GradeSync]
        sovl_curiosity[Education_StudentDB]
        sovl_temperament[Education_LMS_Portal]
        sovl_confidence[Education_ContentCDN]
        sovl_bonder[Education_StudentDB]
        sovl_meditator[Education_StudentDB]
        sovl_viber[Education_StudentDB]
        sovl_striver[Education_ClassroomService]
    end

    %% Hippocampus
    subgraph Hippocampus[Education_GradeSync]
        sovl_scaffold[Education_ClassroomService]
        sovl_engram[Education_ContentCDN]
        sovl_manager[Education_GradeSync]
        sovl_recaller[Education_GradeSync]
    end

    %% Insula
    subgraph Insula[Education_ContentCDN]
        sovl_trainer[Education_ContentCDN]
        sovl_queue[Education_ContentCDN]
        sovl_scribe[Education_LMS_Portal]
    end

    %% Motor Cortex
    subgraph Motor_Cortex[Education_ContentCDN]
        sovl_volition[Education_LMS_Portal]
        sovl_gate[Education_StudentDB]
    end

    %% Pineal Gland 
    subgraph Pineal_Gland[Education_ClassroomService]
        sovl_printer[Education_ContentCDN]
        sovl_fuser[Education_ContentCDN]
    end

    %% Broca
    subgraph Broca[Education_LMS_Portal]
        sovl_swarm[Education_ContentCDN]
    end

    %% Hypothalamus
    subgraph Hypothalamus[Education_ClassroomService]
        sovl_error[Education_LMS_Portal]
        sovl_logger[Education_GradeSync]
        sovl_records[Education_StudentDB]
    end

    %% Glial Network
    subgraph Glial_Network[Education_ClassroomService]
        sovl_interfaces[Education_GradeSync]
        sovl_hardware[Education_ContentCDN]
        sovl_data[Education_StudentDB]
        sovl_state[Education_ContentCDN]
    end

    %% Janus
    subgraph Janus[Education_LMS_Portal]
        run_sovl[Education_LMS_Portal]
    end

    %% Data Store
    subgraph Data_Store[Education_ContentCDN]
        chronicle[Education_GradeSync]
    end

    %% Flows: Grouped by Function
    %% 1. Entry and Orchestration
    run_sovl --> sovl_main
    run_sovl --> sovl_cli
    sovl_main <--> sovl_conductor
    sovl_main <--> sovl_events

    %% 2. Configuration
    sovl_schema --> sovl_config
    sovl_config --> sovl_main
    sovl_config --> sovl_generation
    sovl_config --> sovl_trainer

    %% 3. Sensory and Support
    sovl_monitor --> sovl_main
    sovl_memory --> sovl_main
    sovl_resource --> sovl_main
    sovl_cli --> sovl_main
    sovl_monitor --> sovl_cli
    sovl_processor --> sovl_main
    sovl_utils --> sovl_main
    sovl_io --> sovl_main
    sovl_processor --> sovl_generation
    sovl_utils --> sovl_generation
    sovl_io --> sovl_generation
    sovl_processor --> sovl_trainer
    sovl_utils --> sovl_trainer
    sovl_io --> sovl_trainer

    %% 4. Emotional and Cognitive Processing
    sovl_curiosity --> sovl_primer
    sovl_temperament --> sovl_primer
    sovl_confidence --> sovl_primer
    sovl_bonder --> sovl_primer
    sovl_meditator --> sovl_primer
    sovl_primer --> sovl_generation
    sovl_cli -->|Talk| sovl_main --> sovl_generation
    sovl_curiosity --> sovl_viber
    sovl_temperament --> sovl_viber
    sovl_viber --> sovl_primer
    sovl_viber <--> sovl_recaller
    sovl_striver --> sovl_primer

    %% 5. Memory and Learning
    sovl_engram <--> sovl_scaffold
    sovl_manager --> sovl_scaffold
    sovl_recaller --> sovl_generation
    sovl_scaffold --> sovl_main
    sovl_queue --> sovl_scribe
    sovl_scribe --> sovl_trainer
    sovl_scribe --> sovl_scaffold
    sovl_swarm --> sovl_scaffold
    sovl_swarm --> sovl_engram
    sovl_scribe -- creates --> chronicle
    chronicle -- used by --> sovl_trainer
    sovl_recaller --> sovl_generation

    %% 6. Action and Output
    sovl_volition <--> sovl_main
    sovl_gate --> sovl_volition
    sovl_main <--> sovl_printer
    sovl_main --> sovl_fuser

    %% 7. Regulation
    sovl_main --> sovl_error
    sovl_generation --> sovl_error
    sovl_trainer --> sovl_error
    sovl_main --> sovl_logger
    sovl_generation --> sovl_logger
    sovl_trainer --> sovl_logger
    sovl_memory --> sovl_hardware
    sovl_main --> sovl_interfaces
    sovl_state --> sovl_interfaces
    sovl_conductor --> sovl_interfaces

    %% 8. State
    sovl_state --> sovl_data
    sovl_main --> sovl_state
    sovl_bonder --> sovl_state
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
